verses.verse: Then again <S%H7725><s%> I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H5774><s%> a flying scroll. <S%H4039><s%>

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H7200><s%> "What do you see?" I answered, <S%H559><s%> "I see <S%H7200><s%> a flying <S%H5774><s%> scroll; <S%H4039><s%> its length <S%H753><s%> is twenty <S%H6242><s%> cubits, <S%H520><s%> and its breadth <S%H7341><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> cubits. <S%H520><s%>"

Then he said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H423><s%> "This is the curse that goes out <S%H3318><s%> over the surface <S%H6440><s%> of the whole land; <S%H776><s%> for everyone who steals <S%H1589><s%> shall be cut off <S%H5352><s%> according <S%H3644><s%> to it on the one side; <S%H7650><s%> and everyone who swears falsely shall be cut off <S%H5352><s%> according to it on the other side. <S%H3644><s%>

I will cause it to go out, <S%H3318><s%>" says <S%H5002><s%> Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> of Armies, <S%H6635><s%> "and it will enter <S%H935><s%> into the house <S%H1004><s%> of the thief, <S%H1590><s%> and into the house <S%H1004><s%> of him who swears <S%H7650><s%> falsely <S%H8267><s%> by my name; <S%H8034><s%> and it will remain <S%H3885><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of his house, <S%H1004><s%> and will destroy <S%H3615><s%> it with its timber <S%H6086><s%> and its stones. <S%H68><s%>"

Then the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me came forward, <S%H3318><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H5375><s%> "Lift up now your eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> what is this that is appearing. <S%H3318><s%>"

I said, <S%H559><s%> "What is it? <S%H559><s%>" He said, "This is the ephah <S%H374><s%> basket that is appearing. <S%H559><s%>" He said moreover, <S%H5869><s%> "This is their appearance in all the land <S%H776><s%>

(and behold, <S%H3603><s%> a talent of lead <S%H5777><s%> was lifted up <S%H5375><s%>); and this is a <S%H259><s%> woman <S%H802><s%> sitting <S%H3427><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the ephah basket. <S%H374><s%>"

He said, <S%H559><s%> "This is Wickedness; <S%H7564><s%>" and he threw <S%H7993><s%> her down into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the ephah <S%H374><s%> basket; <S%H7993><s%> and he threw the weight <S%H68><s%> of lead <S%H5777><s%> on its mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

Then lifted I up <S%H5375><s%> my eyes, <S%H5869><s%> and saw, <S%H7200><s%> and behold, <S%H3318><s%> there were two <S%H8147><s%> women, <S%H802><s%> and the wind <S%H7307><s%> was in their wings. <S%H3671><s%> Now they had <S%H2007><s%> wings <S%H3671><s%> like the wings <S%H3671><s%> of a stork, <S%H2624><s%> and they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> the ephah <S%H374><s%> basket between earth <S%H776><s%> and the sky. <S%H8064><s%>
Then I said <S%H559><s%> to the angel <S%H4397><s%> who talked <S%H1696><s%> with me, <S%H3212><s%> "Where are these carrying the ephah basket? <S%H374><s%>"

He said <S%H559><s%> to me, <S%H1129><s%> "To build her a house <S%H1004><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Shinar. <S%H8152><s%> When it is prepared, <S%H3559><s%> she will be set <S%H3240><s%> there in her own place. <S%H4369><s%>"
